sentences.en: Amazon, by far the largest bookseller in the country, reported on May 19 that it is now selling more books in its electronic Kindle format than in the old paper and ink format.
sentences.cn: 国内目前最大的书商亚马逊公司5月19日表示，Kindle 电子书的销量已经超过了纸质书。

sentences.en: Bookseller: I guarantee you'll love it!
sentences.cn: 书商：我保证你会喜欢它的！

sentences.en: I think more than anyone else because I'm a bookseller.
sentences.cn: 我比任何人想的都多，因为我是一个书商。
